============
SectionInput
============

.. code:: xml

    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
    <SectionInput>
      <identifier>new-section</identifier>
      <name>New Section</name>
    </SectionInput>

.. code:: javascript

    {
      "SectionInput":
      {
        "identifier": "new-section",
        "name": "New Section",
      }
    }

.. code:: javascript

    {
      "SectionInput":
      [
        {
          "identifier": "new-section",
          "name": "New Section",
        }
      ]
    }



..
   Local Variables:
   mode: rst
   fill-column: 79
   End:
